Class VisionTracking

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.templates.VisionTracking

  • public class VisionTracking
extends Object
    This class will be used to calculate and get needed information based on vision tracking.

        Sets dimensions of blob to variables

        public void calcTargetDist()

      • angleDirection

        public void angleDirection(double rightHeight,
                  double leftHeight)
        Sees if robot is left or right of target. If angleDirection is true, robot is on the right. If angleDirection is false, robot is on the left.
        Parameters:
        rightHeight - height of right side of target in pixels
        leftHeight - height of left side of target in pixels

      • calcTargetAngle

        Calculates angle target is turned away from the camera

      • run

        public double run(double width,
         double height)
        Calculates distance from target and returns it
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • run

        public double run(double width,
         double height,
         double rightHeight,
         double leftHeight)
        Calculates distance from target and target angle and returns distance
        Parameters:
        width - pseudowidth of target in pixels
        height - height of target in pixels
        rightHeight - height of right side of target in pixels
        leftHeight - height of left side of target in pixels
        Returns:
        distance from target in feet
